argument.description: A numeric value used in the calculation.
A numeric value used in the calculation.

returnType: The REMAINDER function returns a numeric value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL REMAINDER function returns the remainder of m divided by n.
sample:
REMAINDER(15, 6)
Result: 3

REMAINDER(15, 5)
Result: 0

REMAINDER(15, 4)
Result: -1

REMAINDER(11.6, 2)
Result: -0.4

REMAINDER(11.6, 2.1)
Result: -1

REMAINDER(-15, 4)
Result: 1
